Name: Glorious Season
Title: Barbara: Glorious Season
Source: Reward for inviting Barbara to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Glorious Season
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1201]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1201] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12012]</color> once.
When your $[A1201], who has this card equipped, is on the field, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112011]</color> will allow you to spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character." (Once per round)
(You must have $[A1201] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C112011.Name: Melody Loop
C112011.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal all your characters for 1 HP and your active character gains $[K202].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K202.Name: <color=#80C0FFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro Application</color>
K202.Desc:
When {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: The target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: Creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
